sequence:
"Virtual Connection Synchronicity" - Daily Memorabilia

<size=45>Chapter 6 - Judge Kizuna AI</size>

scripts.say: Virtual You- Wait! No! Judge Kizuna AI here! While I've never touched on the law before, sometimes you just gotta wing it, right?
It's up to my gloomy self to determine who's guilty and who's innocent!
And so the First Azur Lane Kizuna Ai Court is now IN SESSIONNNNNN!!
*BANG BANG*
Our first case will be the trial of this young lady here. YORK, PLEASE!
The other day, I had the Commander try some of my York's Special Drink I created while putting my talents to use in "Beverage Development."
But just as he partook of the beverage, the Commander's very soul slipped its bonds and the officer fell into a deep sleep!
Wow! What the heck did you put in it?
I simply crafted it with the guidance of †Fate† Herself. Twas the indomitable power of †Love† boiled up from my breast!
Ooh. Kinda hot, huh? Anyway I have no idea what you're talking about so I asked Ms. Vestal to join us. Please, explain to the court what incapacitated the Commander?
Aye-aye. After a thorough medical examination, I discovered some residual toxins.
Th- that's absurd! My perfect †Formulation† would never employ such crude ingredients.
Hmmm. Now we have one of York's "Special Drinks" right here. Why don't you take a swig and see if that answers some questions?
Verily! In fact, I've never had a chance to taste it before. Allow me to prove my †Innocence† by draining this very cup!
York, I really don't think you should- aaand she's already drinking it.
*Gulp! Gulp! Nnnnnnggggggg!*
Ah- are you all right!? You're turning as blue as a berry!!

Urkk... it's... a sort of "writhing around on the ground" kind of flavor. I.... understand how the Commander felt.... and with this, we are accomplices in draining the †Chalice of Sin†.... *collapses*
York!? Ms. Vestal! Can you do anything for her!?
Aye-aye. But we've really gone too far here. Do you think you could let me handle it next time, AI?
....and they're gone.
Oh, we were in the middle of a Kizuna AI trial!
Wellllllll... I guess I should pass judgment.
*BANG BANG*
NOT GUILTY
I thought she was guilty at first, but then she went ahead and chugged that stuff down all by herself. I gotta give props for that. I think the Commander'll forgive her too!
I mean I did all this for the Commander's sake, after all.
Really, all you need is love. And AI means love, got it? Just A.I... J.K.!
Well, maybe someday somebody will drink something again, and then somebody will come along to make the magic happen one more time.
And with that, today's session of Kizuna Ai court is officially ADJOURNED!!
*BANG BANG*
*shudder* I just got the strangest feeling that somebody somewhere was doing something really stupid but... I'm just gonna let it go....
